question: Five capacitors each of value 1 $\mu$F are connected as shown in the figure. The equivalent capacitance between A and B is
images/b2c3d4e5-f6a7-4b8c-9d0e-1f2a3b4c5d6e.png
explanation: This forms a balanced Wheatstone bridge. The central capacitor is ineffective. The equivalent capacitance is equal to the individual capacitance value C.
